example.parse: (IP (NP-SBJ (ADVP (AD 凡是)) (NP (CP (WHNP (-NONE- *OP*)) (IP (VP (VP-FOC (VV 受) (NP-OBJ (DNP (NP (NP (NN 死刑) ) (PU 、) (NP (ADJP (JJ 无期)) (NP (NN 徒刑) )) (CC 或) (NP (LCP (QP (CD 十) (CLP (M 年))) (LC 以上)) (ADJP (JJ 有期)) (NP (NN 徒刑) ))) (DEG 之)) (NP (NN 判决) ))) (VP (ADVP (AD 尚)) (ADVP (AD 未)) (VP (VV 确定)))))) (NP (NN 者) ))) (PU ，) (VP (ADVP (AD 不)) (VP (VV 得) (VP (VRD (VV 登记) (VV 为)) (NP-OBJ (NN 候选人) )))))
